title: Kangaroo and her joey eat food from a bowl at man's house
text:
A homeowner was given a heartwarming surprise after a kangaroo and her joey hopped up to the back of his house.

In a video shared to Reddit, the animal is seen standing at the door before making its way into the backyard of the New South Wales property.

The mother is then seen tucking into a huge bowl of bird seed that the owner had left out.

Many Reddit users praised the man for being so generous towards the kangaroo and her baby.

'Poor mama. Good on you for giving her a feed. She must be starving to ask like this,' one user said.

'Good on you for giving the wildlife a feed and having water out. They may be a nuisance but that mama was no doubt very grateful,' another commented.

The kangaroo then helped itself to a bowl of bird seed that the owner had put out for her (pictured)

The man said he didn't usually give food to any wandering kangaroos but was unable to say no after seeing 'that look on her face'.

He also said the animals were common in his neighbourhood, and he regularly left out water for any passing by.

Australia has twice as many kangaroos as it has people.

But some states have seen population numbers dive as drought continues to dry up their food and water sources.
description: In a video shared to Reddit, the animal is seen standing at the door before making its way into the backyard of the New South Wales property.
authors: Eliza Mcphee For Daily Mail Australia
